articles.title: Chrysler to go all-electric by 2028, CEO says - CBC News
articles.description: Automaker Stellantis' Chrysler brand said on Wednesday it plans to shift to an all-electric lineup by 2028 and introduce new products, including a utility vehicle, as it moves forward, the North American brand's chief executive said.
articles.content: Automaker Stellantis' Chrysler brand said on Wednesday it plans to shift to an all-electric lineup by 2028 and introduce new products, including a utility vehicle, as it moves forward, the North Amer… [+2900 chars]

articles.title: US records over a million cases in one day - eNCA
articles.description: Despite the record numbers, many Americans are still reluctant to get Covid-19 vaccine booster shots.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - The Omicron Covid-19 variant is wreaking havoc in the US.
Data from Johns Hopkins University reveals the country recorded over a million infections on Monday.
